_meanings:
{@--1@} To desire, long
or wish for, expect; {#pratyASvasaMtaM#} 
{#ripurAcakAMkza#} <ls>R. 7. 47</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 162</ls>,
<ls n="Ms.">10. 121</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 153</ls>; <ls>Me. 91.</ls>

{@--4@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To require some
word or words to be supplied for
the completion of the sense; see
{#AkAMkzA#} below.
